title: Implement GitHub Security Rules
description:
Create and enforce security rules for GitHub access:

1. Create GIT-SECURITY-RULES.md
2. Define forbidden operations (push main, force push, delete)
3. Establish branch naming conventions
4. Document authorized agents and access levels
5. Set up credential management
